title: Niobrara National Scenic River: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Results   Showing results 1-2 of 2    Sort By:  Title Date         Niobrara National Scenic River Cows in the Campground - Pre-Visit Writing Activity   Students will read about the community of the Niobrara Valley prior to their field trip to develop an understanding of the significance of development and its co-existence with preservation of a natural resource. Students will demonstrate their understanding of the interrelationships contained in the river system by writing a descriptive essay based on an essay prompt of their choice.    Type:Field Trips Grade level:Upper Elementary: Third Grade through Fifth Grade Subjects:Literacy and Language Arts        Niobrara National Scenic River Create-Your-Own Field Experience   Tell us what you'd like to cover and we'll create a Niobrara-specific program for you. Since we work in partnership with other agencies to secure access for these programs, field-immersion experiences require at least two weeks notice. Past locations have included Smith Falls State Park, Fort Niobrara National Wildlife Refuge, and The Nature Conservancy's Niobrara Valley Preserve.    Type:Field Trips Grade level:Pre-Kindergarten-Adult Education (general)
